mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop (shop_representation_name, shop_created_at, shop_business_number) VALUES (#{shopRepresentationName}, #{shopCreatedAt}, #{shopBusinessNumber})

INSERT INTO shop (shop_name, shop_location, shop_category, shop_business_time, shop_tel, shop_introduction, shop_closed_day, shop_representation_name, shop_business_number, shop_created_at, shop_member_id) VALUES (#{shopName}, #{shopLocation}, #{shopCategory}, #{shopBusinessTime}, #{shopTel}, #{shopIntroduction}, #{shopClosedDay}, #{shopRepresentationName}, #{shopBusinessNumber}, #{shopCreatedAt}, #{shopMemberId})
INSERT INTO designer (designer_shop_id, designer_name, designer_introduction, designer_thumbnail) VALUES (#{designerShopId}, #{designerName}, #{designerIntroduction}, #{designerThumbnail})
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET shop_name = #{shopName}, shop_location = #{shopLocation}, shop_category = #{shopCategory}, shop_business_time = #{shopBusinessTime}, shop_tel = #{shopTel}, shop_introduction = #{shopIntroduction}, shop_closed_day = #{shopClosedDay}, shop_updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} and shop_status = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM shop WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} and shop_status = 1
mapper.select: { CALL deleteShopCascade(#{shopId}) }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop WHERE shop_name = #{shopName} AND shop_id != #{shopId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop WHERE shop_tel = #{shopTel} AND shop_id != #{shopId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM designer WHERE designer_name = #{designerName} and designer_id != #{designerId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop WHERE shop_id = #{shopId}
SELECT p.procedure_id, p.procedure_shop_id, s.shop_member_id FROM `procedure` p JOIN shop s ON p.procedure_shop_id = s.shop_id WHERE p.procedure_id = #{procedureId}
SELECT d.designer_id, d.designer_shop_id, s.shop_member_id FROM designer d JOIN shop s ON d.designer_shop_id = s.shop_id WHERE d.designer_id = #{designerId}
SELECT shop_id, shop_name, shop_representation_name, shop_category, shop_location FROM shop WHERE shop_member_id = #{memberId} AND shop_status = 1 LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT shop_id, shop_name, shop_location, shop_category, shop_business_time, shop_tel, shop_introduction, shop_closed_day, shop_business_number, shop_representation_name FROM shop WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} and shop_status = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop WHERE shop_member_id = #{memberId} AND shop_status = 1

SELECT shop_id AS shopId, shop_business_number AS shopBusinessNumber, shop_representation_name AS shopRepresentationName, shop_created_at AS shopCreatedAt, shop_location AS shopLocation, shop_name AS shopName, shop_category AS shopCategory, shop_business_time AS shopBusinessTime, shop_tel AS shopTel, shop_closed_day AS shopClosedDay, shop_introduction AS shopIntroduction FROM shop WHERE shop_id = #{shopId}
SELECT media_urn FROM media WHERE media_target_id = #{shopId} AND media_target_type = 'SHOP'
SELECT shop_id, shop_name FROM shop WHERE shop_member_id = #{memberId} AND shop_status = 1 ORDER BY shop_name ASC
